sentences.en: After his death the house reverted to its original owner.
sentences.cn: 他死后房子归还给了原先的主人.

sentences.en: He was now the proud owner of a bright red sports car.
sentences.cn: 他现在拥有了一辆亮红色跑车，很是自豪。

sentences.en: I naturally took him to be the owner of the estate.
sentences.cn: 我自然而然地把他当成了庄园的主人。

sentences.en: If you can't get any satisfaction, complain to the park owner.
sentences.cn: 如果你得不到任何赔偿，向园区所有者投诉。

sentences.en: It is expected that the new owner will change the yacht's name.
sentences.cn: 估计新主人会给游艇改名。

sentences.en: The car must be returned to its rightful owner.
sentences.cn: 这辆车必须归还给真正的主人。

sentences.en: The gold ring should be given back to the owner.
sentences.cn: 这枚金戒指应该还给失主.

sentences.en: The house was remodelled by its present owner.
sentences.cn: 现在的房主改建了这座房子。

sentences.en: The owner insisted on Cool Ground running in the Gold Cup.
sentences.cn: 主人坚持要让“酷地”参加金杯赛马会。

sentences.en: The owner is making huge profits at the expense of downtrodden peasants.
sentences.cn: 物主靠压榨农民而赢得暴利。

sentences.en: The painting has been returned to its rightful owner .
sentences.cn: 这幅画已归还给合法所有权人。

sentences.en: The plantation owner has possessed himself of a vast piece of land.
sentences.cn: 这个种植园主把大片土地占为己有.

sentences.en: the proud owner of a new car
sentences.cn: 得意扬扬的新汽车主人

sentences.en: The restaurant owner could only speak pidgin English.
sentences.cn: 餐馆老板只会讲洋泾浜英语。

sentences.en: The stolen car was returned to its rightful owner .
sentences.cn: 被盗的汽车还给了其合法的主人。

sentences.en: They held up the owner and robbed him of everything.
sentences.cn: 他们劫持了货主,并抢走了他的所有东西.
